name: Unbroken Warrior
description: Take part in the most bizarre fighting tournament. Train your fighter and win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
